title: The synthesis and evaluation of novel ALK inhibitors containing the sulfoxide structure
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17557-17570
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01556H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Han Yao, Yuanyuan Ren, Feng Wu, Jiadai Liu, Longcai Cao, Ming Yan, Xingshu Li
With ceritinib as the lead, a series of novel compounds containing the sulfoxide structure were synthesized and evaluated as anaplastic lymphoma kinase inhibitors.
